name: Red light, Green light (J U S T N A T E)
name_original: Red light, Green light (J U S T N A T E)
description: Red light, Green light is a simple game that relies on your judgement and patients. in this simple game you have to press space while the screen is green, but it will randomly flash red, if you press while the screen goes red you will lose all of you points and will have to start again, this is where you have to predict and play it smart in order to get the highest score. there are no winners, only personal bests.
developers: J U S T N A T E
